short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance SEQTA Learn's usability and aesthetics! A fork of BetterSEQTA to continue development add add heaps more features!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üåü BetterSEQTA+ üåü
Making SEQTA Learn actually enjoyable! (yes, really!)

üé® What's New & Awesome:
- Live wallpapers that make your dashboard feel alive! Watch cherry blossoms float by while doing math 
 (way better than staring at that blank white screen, right?)
- Upload your own background images/videos because why not make SEQTA your happy place?
- Pick ANY color you want! Purple SEQTA? Sure! Hot pink? Go wild! 
- Custom themes that transform SEQTA into something actually beautiful (we know, shocking!)

‚ú® All The Good Stuff You Already Love:
- Dark mode that won't burn your eyes at 11PM when you remember that assignment
- Reorganize the menu (goodbye, things you never use!)
- Next lesson notifications so you don't accidentally walk into English with your Science books
- Better-looking... well, everything!
- A homepage that actually makes sense (revolutionary, we know)

üèÉ Quick Access to:
- Your daily lessons (because who has time to click 17 buttons?)
- Important notices (no more "I didn't see it!")
- All the stuff you actually use (and none of the stuff you don't)

üîç Find the magic here: https://github.com/betterseqta/betterseqta-plus

‚ö†Ô∏è Fine Print: This isn't officially from Education Horizons - we're just students who thought SEQTA needed some love! (And boy, did it need it...).

PS: This is the cooler cousin of the original BetterSEQTA. Same family, more pizzazz! ‚ú®

We hope you LOVE this improved EDUCATION experience!!! :D
